verses.text: \w This|strong="H1696"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w through|strong="H3027"\w* \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w concerning|strong="H1697"\w* Babylon \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* land \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w*:\f + \fr 50:1 \ft That is, the Babylonians; also in verses 8, 25, 35, and 45\f*

\w My|strong="H1961"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w are|strong="H5971"\w* lost \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w*; \w their|strong="H1961"\w* \w shepherds|strong="H7462"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w led|strong="H1980"\w* \w them|strong="H8582"\w* \w astray|strong="H8582"\w*, \w causing|strong="H7462"\w* \w them|strong="H8582"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* roam \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*. \w They|strong="H5971"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w wandered|strong="H8582"\w* \w from|strong="H1980"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w hill|strong="H2022"\w*; \w they|strong="H5971"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w forgotten|strong="H7911"\w* \w their|strong="H1961"\w* \w resting|strong="H7258"\w* \w place|strong="H1961"\w*.

\w All|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w them|strong="H4672"\w* devoured \w them|strong="H4672"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w enemies|strong="H6862"\w* said, ‘\w We|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* guilty, \w for|strong="H8478"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w* \w against|strong="H2398"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w true|strong="H3068"\w* \w pasture|strong="H5116"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w hope|strong="H4723"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* fathers.’

\w Flee|strong="H5110"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* Babylon; \w depart|strong="H3318"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w land|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w*; \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* he-goats \w that|strong="H1961"\w* \w lead|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w flock|strong="H6629"\w*.

Babylon’s Fall Is Certain

“\w Because|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w rejoice|strong="H8055"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* sing \w in|strong="H8055"\w* \w triumph|strong="H5937"\w*— \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w who|strong="H3588"\w* \w plunder|strong="H8154"\w* \w My|strong="H3588"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*— \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* frolic \w like|strong="H5159"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w heifer|strong="H5697"\w* treading grain \w and|strong="H8055"\w* \w neigh|strong="H6670"\w* \w like|strong="H5159"\w* stallions,

\w your|strong="H2009"\w* mother \w will|strong="H1471"\w* \w be|strong="H1471"\w* \w greatly|strong="H3966"\w* \w ashamed|strong="H2659"\w*; she \w who|strong="H1471"\w* \w bore|strong="H3205"\w* \w you|strong="H3205"\w* \w will|strong="H1471"\w* \w be|strong="H1471"\w* \w disgraced|strong="H2659"\w*. \w Behold|strong="H2009"\w*, she \w will|strong="H1471"\w* \w be|strong="H1471"\w* \w the|strong="H3205"\w* least \w of|strong="H3205"\w* \w the|strong="H3205"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w dry|strong="H6723"\w* \w land|strong="H6723"\w*, \w and|strong="H1471"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w desert|strong="H6160"\w*.

\w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w scattered|strong="H6340"\w* \w flock|strong="H7716"\w*, \w chased|strong="H5080"\w* \w away|strong="H5080"\w* \w by|strong="H3478"\w* lions. \w The|strong="H5019"\w* \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* devour \w him|strong="H4428"\w* \w was|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H5019"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Assyria; \w the|strong="H5019"\w* last \w to|strong="H3478"\w* crush \w his|strong="H3478"\w* \w bones|strong="H6105"\w* \w was|strong="H3478"\w* \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5019"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Babylon.”

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w this|strong="H3651"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: “\w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w punish|strong="H6485"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Babylon \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* land \w as|strong="H3651"\w* \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w punished|strong="H6485"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Assyria.
